q8.question: What is the Package.json?
options: File that holds various metadata relevant to the project. This file is used to give information to npm that allows it to identify the project as well as handle the project's dependencies
File automatically generated for any operations where npm modifies either the node_modules tree, or package.json. It describes the exact tree that was generated
File present in the node_modules folder and define all the dependencies for a nodejs app
q8.answer: File that holds various metadata relevant to the project. This file is used to give information to npm that allows it to identify the project as well as handle the project's dependencies
